subject: Swimming
Women's British Open (Golf)
Golf
Football
lead_paragraph: The day in sports included preparations for the Women’s British Open in Scotland, the return to work by N.F.L. players and a dead heat in the 100-meter backstroke at the world championships in Shanghai.
snippet: The day in sports included preparations for the Women’s British Open in Scotland, the return to work by N.F.L. players and a dead heat in the 100-meter backstroke at the world championships in Shanghai.
